```cpp
Task P {
    1\. num = 5
    2\. num++
    3\. num = num – 2
    4\. x = 10
    5\. num = num + x
}
```

```cpp
Run 1:
  1\. num = 5
  2\. num++
>>>>> Context Switch <<<<<
  3\. num = num – 2
  4\. x = 10
>>>>> Context Switch <<<<<
  5\. num = num + x
```

```cpp
Run 2:
  num = 5
  >> Context Switch <<
  num++
  num = num – 2
  >> Context Switch <<
  x = 10
  >> Context Switch <<
  num = num + x
```

```cpp
     Task P     |    Task Scheduler   |    Task Q    
----------------------------------------------------
                |    Context Switch   |             
                |                     |  B = X
                |                     |  B = B + 2
                |    Context Switch   |
  A = X         |                     |
                |    Context Switch   |
                |                     |  X = B
                |    Context Switch   |
  A = A + 1     |                     |
  X = A         |                     |
                |    Context Switch   |
                |                     |  print X
                |    Context Switch   |
  print X       |                     |
                |    Context Switch   |
```

```cpp
   Task P    |    Task Scheduler   |    Task Q
-------------------------------------------------
             |    Context Switch   |
             |                     |    B = X
             |                     |    B = B + 2
             |                     |    X = B
             |    Context Switch   |
 A = X       |                     |
 A = A + 1   |                     |
             |    Context Switch   |
             |                     |    print X
             |    Context Switch   |
 X = A       |                     |
 print X     |                     |
             |    Context Switch   |
```
